abstract: A descriptive name for the object.
overview:
## Discussion

Many types of Model I/O objects support this property. For objects loaded from a file using the [doc://com.apple.modelio/documentation/ModelIO/MDLAsset] class, this property may reflect the name or label assigned by an artist using 3D authoring tools.

# name

**Instance Property**

A descriptive name for the object.

## Declaration

```swift
var name: String { get set }
```

## Discussion

Many types of Model I/O objects support this property. For objects loaded from a file using the [doc://com.apple.modelio/documentation/ModelIO/MDLAsset] class, this property may reflect the name or label assigned by an artist using 3D authoring tools.
title: name
